牄字的基本解释

牄
qiāng
鸟兽求食的声音：“鸟兽牄牄。”

牄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiāng］
［《廣韻》七羊切，平陽，清。］
见“牄牄”。

牄字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【爿字部】　牄； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页692第18
【唐韻】七羊切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】千羊切，?音鏘。【說文】鳥獸來食聲也。从倉爿聲。虞書曰：鳥獸牄牄。◎按今書益稷作蹌。　又【公羊傳·定十四年】楚滅頓以頓，子牄歸。左傳作牂，詳牂字註。【集韻】或作?。

牄字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
牄字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
qiāng
The sound of birds and beasts begging for food: "Birds and beasts."
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiāng］
["Guangyun" seven sheep cut, Pingyang, Qing. ]
See "Yan Yan".

[Si Collection] [Fan Character Department] 　yan; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 692 18
[Tang Yun] Seven Sheep Cuts [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Thousands of Sheep Cuts,? Yin Qiang. [Said the text] Birds and beasts come to eat. Sound from Cangyan. Yu Shu said: Birds and Beasts Yan Yan. ◎According to the present book Yiji as a slap.　[Gongyang Biography·Ding 14 Years] Chu Mie and Yi Dun, Zi Yan returned. Zuo Zhuan is made of bamboo, detailed notes on the word. [Ji Yun] Or make?.
